about: My name is Adwait Godbole. I am a Ph.D. student in Computer Science at the University of California, Berkeley, where I am advised by Sanjit A. Seshia. I completed undergraduate training in Computer Science at the Indian Institute of Technology, Bombay.
research: My research interests lie at the intersection of formal methods, computer security, and computer architecture. My focus is on developing novel techniques, applications and theory that makes hardware-software systems more reliable and secure.
